= First working release =

This is the first working release.<br>
link: http://connecting4.googlecode.com/files/NexGenConnect4_18July2009_01.jar <br>

Currently the following features are working:<br>
-single player<br>
-hot-seat<br>
-multi-player through TCP<br>
-status bar showing appropriate messages<br>
-key-controlled arrow<br>
-a few board sizes<br>

Missing features and known problems:<br>
see issue: http://code.google.com/p/connecting4/issues/detail?id=1 <br>
